news.headline: New Shipment of Winery T-Shirts have arrived!
news.description1: Small, Medium, Large and Extra Large
news.description2: Great quality shirts, featuring the winery logo

news.headline: Lee Klingshirn inducted into the Ohio Wine Hall of Fame
news.description1: The state wine industry recently gathered in Dublin, Ohio to honor Claudio Salvador, owner and winemaker at Firelands Winery in Sandusky, and Lee Klingshirn, owner and winemaker at Klingshirn Winery in Avon Lake. The two winemakers were inducted into the Ohio Wine Hall of Fame.

events.name: Spring Steak Fry
events.description1: Adult dinners consist of a 16-ounce Porterhouse steak, scalloped potato, salad, vegetable, roll, dessert, & coffee or tea.
events.description3: Price: $30.00 per person. Cost of your wine is extra.
events.description4:
Reservations Only
For Reservations, Call us at (440) 933-6666 or e-mail us at info@klingshirnwine.com

events.name: Meet & Greet the Winemaker
